name: GoBang
0:
”Alexa, open Gobang game”
”My move is three five”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gobang game
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill plays tic tac toe (noughts and crosses) on a twelve by twelve board. You have to get five 'noughts' in a row.
Alexa plays first with an 'X'. You give your position as X - across and y - down, with numbers from one to twelve.
The board is displayed on devices with a screen, but you will need pen and paper if you have a voice only device.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
